name: Last Man (itch)
description:
Story:This game is (loosely) based on the novel "The Last Man" by Mary Shelly. A strange new virus has infected the worlds population. All you friends and loved ones are dead. You could give in to despair, or set out on your personal quest to consolidate the worlds knowledge. In this adaptation the infected have become zombies, cuz fun.

GamePlay: Around the level there are 7 books. Collect them all and win.

Notes:This is the first game I've ever by my self. I entered the original (much more buggy) version in Global game jam 2018. Here https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/last-man        is  a link if you want to check it out.

I had some help modeling from these awesome frens.

Kerrie Bash: modeler

Cody Davis: 3D Modler 

Ian Speegil: secret   modeler
